Consultant, Professional Services  
at Fortinet Location:  Riyadh, Saudi Arabia  
Company Industry:  IT Services  
Job Role:  Network Security Consultation.  
Deliver Professional Services projects.  
Work closely with PMO team to ensure successful completion of projects.  
Provide professional, timely services for Fortinet clients such as:  
Recommending and implementing Fortinet best practices.  
Organizing ad -hoc workshops.  
Creating network security infrastructure designs.  
Developing and maintaining project documentation such as high/low level design documentation, method 
of procedure, test plans, configuration templates, and scripts.  
Installing, provisioning, c ustomizing equipment according to design specifications. o Integrating security 
components, including scripts development.  
Verifying Fortinet configurations based on recommended and approved design.  
Delivering knowledge transfer to client staff.  
Assisting PMO during project scoping.  
Develop new skills based on business requirements.  
Maintain and develop competency on Fortinet’s entire product line and technologies.  
Some of major projects with Fortinet are  listed below:  
  
STC Firewall and FortiWeb deployment . 
 Jarir Book Store security solution . 
 Royal Commission for  Jubail: Firewall migration from Cisco to Fortinet and FortiAnalyzer . 
 NIC: WiFi project.  
 STC: LTE Secure GateWay . 
 Al Rajhi Bank: New Data Center, 6 clusters of firewalls – migration and deployment.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
March 2013 - July 2015  
Information Security Advisor  
at Saudi Telecommunication Company. BSc  (honor) in Computer Engineering 2X CCIE (RS+Data 
Center) #29624 Location:  Riyadh, Saudi Arabia  
Company Industry:  Telecommunications  
Job Role:  Information Technology  
Assist in developing & maintaining IT Security related procedures.

Evaluate IT security related technology architecture.

Propose IT Security technology direction.  
Propose new security initiatives (Technol ogy watch).  
Evaluate and advise on the acquirement of IT security related software.  
Participate in the definition of contractors’ scope of work, develop RFP technical content, and participate 
in the selection of contractors.  
Design ‘best of breed’ IT Secu rity Controls in line with the requirements of the business and in support of 
GDIS strategy.  
Performs security solution modeling and prototyping, and testing of new security solution/equipment and 
security design modifications.  
Define technical access cont rols to minimize security risks.  
Manage implementation and deployment of network infrastructures and services  
Define security process management framework and methodology  
Evaluation of policy and procedures practice within organization  
Developed and implem ented Enterprise Security Awareness Program which addresses organization’s 
needs and effective implementation to change employees attitude towards information security issues 
Reports and updates and status reports to senior management  
Designing and develop ing different modules and providing proper interfaces between them to help ensure 
the high cohesion and low coupling  
Participating in development of test plans for unit testing and formal testing.  
3rd level support for SOC (Security Operation Center)  
Provi ding Bulk SMS and MMS service to STC customers through VPN and Frame relay
